name: Antelope Mask
desc: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. 2-aff-red/2-aff-blue At start of your act, if insane, gain +1 speed.

name: Apostle Crown
desc: jewelry, Accessory. Armor 3 on head. At the start of your act, if you have any +1 strength tokens, reveal the next 4 monster hit locations and put them back in any order.

name: Armor Spikes
desc: item, bone, heavy. If adjacent to the monster when you suffer a severe body injury, the monster suffers a wound. Limit, once per round.

name: Beacon Shield
desc: 1/6/5. Block 2: spend move to ignore 2 hits next time you are attacked (up until your next act). You cannot block more than once per attack. Shield adds +2 armor to all locations.

name: Beetle Eye Shield
desc: 2/7+/3 The shield has a myriad of eyes on the front to confuse the opponent. If a trap hit location card is drawn during your attacks, discard it and draw another hit location card. 1x/attack. Block 1.
material: 1x scarab shell, 1x compound eye, 1x web silk

name: Blast Shield
desc: 1/7+/4 weapon,melee,shield,metal. Block 1. The first time you block a hit each showdown, gain the priority target token. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.

name: Blue Ring
desc: jewelry, amber. Accessory. 3x 0.5-aff-blue = If you are the monster controller when the monster draws AI, draw 1 extra card. Select 1 to play and discard the other.

name: Cycloid Scale Hood
desc: Whenever you spend movement, the scales' color shift. Gain +1 evasion until your next act.

name: Cycloid Scale Jacket
desc: When you spend movement, you Shadow Walk and may move through occupied spaces without causing collision. 1x 0.5-aff-blue / 2x 1-aff-red = +1 accuracy
material: 1x cycloid scales, 1x scrap, 1x huge sunteeth, 1x salt

name: Cycloid Scale Shoes
desc: 1x 0.5-aff-blue / 1x 0.5-aff-green = Spend movement: You are not a threat until you attack. If you have the priority target token, gain 2 survival and remove it.

name: Cycloid Scale Skirt
desc: 1x 0.5-aff-green / 3x 1-aff-blue = When you depart, gain survival equal to the number of blue affinities you have.

name: Cycloid Scale Sleeves
desc: When you Shadow Walk and attack a monster from its blind spot, your weapon gains +1 accuracy and Sharp for that attack.
material: 1x cycloid scales, 1x bone, 1x small sunteeth, 1x salt

name: Death Mask
desc: Unique, irreplaceable, accessory (not armor). If you have NO affinities, gain +4 luck and suffer -4 to all severe injury rolls.

name: Dragon Belt
desc: armor,set,metal. You are not knocked down from suffering a heavy injury.

name: Dragon Boots
desc: armor,set,metal. Gain +2 movement during your act.

name: Dragon Gloves
desc: armor,set,metal

name: Dragon Mantle
desc: armor,set,metal. At the start of the showdown, you beat your chest mightily and gain survival up to the survival limit.
material: 1x horn fragment, 1x iron, 1x hardened ribs, 1x leather

name: Dragonskull Helm
desc: armor,set,bone,metal. Gain +1 to all severe heady injury roll results. Ignore shattered jaw severe injury result.

name: Feather Shield
desc: 3/7/0 weapon. Block 1. 1-aff-green/1-aff-blue/1-aff-red = reduce any suffered brain damage by 1, to min of 1. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.

name: Fetorsaurus
desc: 2/5+/9. weapon,set,melee,shield,metal. Block 2. Add 2 to all hit locations (as shown). While you carry this, reduce star damage from monster level by 1.
material: 1x beacon shield, 1x underplate fungus, 1x sleeping virus flower, 1x elixir of life

name: Flower Knight Helm
desc: armor,heavy. +1 Accuracy. 3x 1-aff-green = While you are being attacked, the monster has -1 speed.

name: Forsaker Mask
desc: Unique, irreplaceable, accessory (not armor). At the start of your act, if insane gain +1 action. During settlement phase, you may archive this item to build the mask maker location.
material: Either defeat lvl 3 Butcher and roll 10 or combo of lvl 1-2 and also crit wound his head

name: God Mask
desc: Unique, irreplaceable, accessory (not armor). 2-aff-red/2-aff-green/2-aff-blue = at start of action, if insane then gain +1 survival.

name: Gorment Boots
desc: armor, set, gormskin, heavy. Other survivors may move through but not end movement in a space you occupy.

name: Gorment Mask
desc: armor, set, gormskin, heavy. 1x 0.5-aff-blue / 1x 0.5-aff-green = If your courage is higher than the monster level, ignore Intimidate actions.

name: Gorment Sleeves
desc: armor, set, gormskin, heavy. 2x 1-aff-green = You may Guard without spending survival (see Gorment Suit for Guard).

name: Gorment Suit
desc: armor, set, gormskin, heavy. 1x 1-aff-blue / 1x 0.5-aff-green / 1x 1-aff-green = Guard: at the end of your attack, if you are standing and have a shield, spend 1 survival to move 3 spaces directly away from monster and Block 1 for free.

name: Green Boots
desc: armor,set,bone,heavy,metal. You may use the Tumble fighting art (even if you don't know it). You successfully tumble on 2+ instead of 6+.
material: 1x iron, 1x Flower Knight Badge, 1x calcified greaves, 3x bone

name: Green Faulds
desc: armor,set,metal,other. +1 evasion. After drawing hit locations from an attack, you may discard First Strike hit location card.

name: Green Gloves
desc: armor,set,metal. +2 strength. +6 luck when attempting to wound Parry locations.

name: Green Helm
desc: armor,set,bone,metal. +1 luck. When a monster attacks you, you may elect to take a hit on the head and roll 1d10. On 6+, ignore the hit. If adjacent, monster suffers 1 wound.
material: 1x scell, 1x beetle horn, 1x DBK Errant Badge

name: Green Plate
desc: armor,set,metal,gormskin. At the start of the showdown, draw 3 tactics cards. When you attack, the extra weight grants leverage. Your weapon gains the club keyword.
material: 1x Lion Knights left claw, 2x iron, 3x leather, 1x scarab shell

name: Grinning Visage
desc: 2/7/4. Shield. Block 1. When you wound with this shield, you may spend 1 survival to add 1 armor to all hit locations. Limit 1x/attack.
material: Spidicules, destroy Legless Ball, get shield.

name: Hazmat Shield
desc: 2/4+/7 weapon,melee,shield,metal,heavy. Block 2. When the monster performs Unseen Agony or Meltdown, roll 1d10. On 2+ you suffer no damage. Shield adds +2 armor to all locations.

name: Hideous Disguise
desc: Mask. Accessory. Gain +1 strength. At the start of the showdown, if you are fighting the Lion Knight, choose your Role card.

name: Knuckle Shield
desc: 3/7+/1 Block 1. Once per round, if you wound with this weapon, Block 1 for free. Shield adds +0 armor to all locations.

name: Lantern Cuirass
desc: -2 movement. 2x 0.5-aff-blue/2x 0.5-aff-green = when you depart, add 3 armor to all hit locations with metal armor.

name: Lantern Gauntlets
desc: 0.5-aff-green = +2 accuracy with club weapons.

name: Lantern Greaves
desc: 2x 0.5-aff-red/0.5-aff-blue = +2 movement

name: Lantern Helm
desc: 0.5-aff-blue = ear plugs, you are deaf and have -1 accuracy.

name: Leather Boots
desc: 2x 0.5-aff-green = at end of your act, you may move 1 space.

name: Leather Bracers
desc: When you depart, gain +2 survival.

name: Leather Mask
desc: When you depart, gain +2 insanity.

name: Lion Headdress
desc: Accessory (not armor)

name: Lion Skin Cloak
desc: Reduce damage from every hit suffered by 1, to min of 1.

name: Man Mask
desc: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. 1-aff-red/1-aff-green = if insane, you may spend negative attribute tokens in place of survival.

name: Phoenix Faulds
desc: When you depart, gain +1 insanity.

name: Phoenix Gauntlets
desc: When you depart, gain +1 insanity.

name: Phoenix Greaves
desc: If insane, gain +2 movement

name: Phoenix Helm
desc: 0.5-aff-blue/1-aff-green/1-aff-red = if insane at start of showdown, gain +1 evasion token.
material: 1x hollow wing bone, 1x small feather, 1x bone

name: Phoenix Mask
desc: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory. 4x 1-aff-red = if insane, you may dodge 1 additional time per round.

name: Phoenix Plackart
desc: 0.5-aff-green/0.5-aff-blue/0.5-aff-red = if insane, ignore the first hit each round and suffer 1 brain damage instead.

name: Pirahna Helm
desc: Armor - can replace Rawhide set helm. You may spend survival while Frenzied.
material: 1x monster tooth necklace, 1x skull, 1x prismatic gills. Also found in Paul the Savior scenario.

name: Rawhide Boots
desc: When you depart, gain +1 survival.

name: Rawhide Gloves
desc: When you depart, gain +1 survival.

name: Rawhide Headband
desc: 0.5-aff-blue = spend action to reveal the top 2 AI cards. Place them back on top in any order.

name: Rawhide Vest
desc: 0.5-aff-blue/0.5-aff-red = +1 evasion

name: Regal Faulds
desc: Cursed. At the Aftermath perform King's Curse story event.

name: Regal Gauntlet
desc: Cursed. At the Aftermath perform King's Curse story event.

name: Regal Greaves
desc: Cursed. At the Aftermath perform King's Curse story event.

name: Regal Helm
desc: Cursed. At the Aftermath perform King's Curse story event.

name: Regal Plackart
desc: Cursed. At the Aftermath perform King's Curse story event.

name: Regeneration Suit
desc: item, gorm. Accessory. 2x 1-aff-green / 1x 0.5-aff-green = At the end of the showdown, remove any permanent injuries you suffered this showdown.

name: Round Leather Shield
desc: 1/8/1 weapon. Block 1: spend action to ignore 1 hit location next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. Max 1 block/attack. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.

name: Scout's Tunic
desc: armor,set,leather. Takes the place of the leather mask and cuirass in the leather set. No special properties.

name: Scrap Shield
desc: 2/7/3 weapon. Block 1: spend action to ignore 1 hit location next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. Max 1 block/attack. Shield adds +1 armor to all locations.

name: Screaming Bracers
desc: When you Slam, you may pass through other survivors without causing collision.

name: Screaming Coat
desc: Slam: Spend move to move forward in a straight line. If you move 4+ and stop adjacent to monster, then move it back 1 space. It gains -1 toughness until end of round.

name: Screaming Horns
desc: Spend action to Scream: non-deaf insane survivors gain +1 movement until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.

name: Screaming Leg Warmers
desc: When you depart, gain +1 insanity.

name: Silk Body Suit
desc: Reduce damage from every hit location by 2, to a minimum of 1. You may not have any heavy or metal gear in your gear grid.

name: Silk Boots
desc: 2x 0.5-aff-green = +1 movement. Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to gain 2 insanity.

name: Silk Robes
desc: When you depart, gain 1 survival. 2x 0.5-aff-red / 1x 0.5-aff-blue = Spend action to add 1 to all hit locations. Use 1x/showdown.

name: Silk Sash
desc: When you depart, gain 1 survival. 2x 0.5-aff-green = Spend action to add 1 to all hit locations. Use once per showdown.

name: Silk Turban
desc: 1x 0.5-aff-green / 1x 0.5-aff-blue = Spend action to turn the monster to face away from you. Use only during the survivor's turn.

name: Skull Helm
desc: When you suffer a severe head injury, the skull helm is destroyed.

name: Steel Shield
desc: 1/6/6 weapon. Irreplaceable. -3 movement. Spend action or 1 survival to ignore a hit. Shield adds +0 armor to all locations.

name: White Lion Boots
desc: 2x 0.5-aff-red = +1 movement

name: White Lion Coat
desc: Pounce: spend move+action to move 3 spaces in straight line. If you moved 3 spaces, activate a melee weapon with +1 strength.

name: White Lion Gauntlets
desc: When you Pounce, gain +1 accuracy for your next attack (all rolls).

name: White Lion Helm
desc: Spend action and 1 survival to Roar: Non-deaf insane survivors gain +2 strength until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.

name: White Lion Mask
desc: Unique, Irreplaceable, Accessory (not armor). 2x 1-aff-green = spend action to lose all your survival and gain that many +1 strength tokens.
